title: Top Tory Think Tank’s North Sea Oil and Gas ‘Vested Interests’
description:
The influential Conservative-linked Centre for Policy Studies (CPS) has been pushing for further North Sea oil and gas drilling while several of its board members hold financial interests in the industry, a DeSmog investigation has found.
